#summary Re-programming your 9X radio

= Re-programming Your 9X Radio =

== Two options ==

Two principal options exist for getting gruvin9x into your '9X radio.

=== Using Pre-compiled Binary Distributions ===

If you just want to load in the latest firmware version and run, this option is for you. 

Please see [FlashGuide Flash Guide] for details

=== Compiling from source ===

If you'd like to get a look at the source code, maybe make a few changes, have a tinker and/or ultimately commit working improvements or even start you own project based on gruvin9x, then please take a look at [ProgrammingFromSource Programming From Source].
